column2: CJRS time series: number of employments furloughed by gender

column1: Daily figures for furloughing supported by the Job Retention Scheme
Based on claims made by the 14 January. The December figures are provisional and may be revised due to late and amended claims.
Source: HMRC CJRS and PAYE Real Time Information
1.  Gender has been taken from HMRC administrative data.
2.  Where a CJRS claim has not been able to match to other HMRC data, it has been reported as ‘Unknown’.
